abstract: 'A job had to be done, and we just pressed on.'
description: On the 16th May, 1941, Alan Clark was called up to serve for Australia in World War II. He tells of his time training in New South Wales, his decision to join the Air Force and the precise skill involved with dropping mines.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002337; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [September 2010]; Active; 2010
